mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STAFF SF LEFT OUTER JOIN STAFF_SKILL SS ON SF.STAFF_NO = SS.STAFF_NO JOIN CODE_SKILL CS ON SS.SKILL_CODE = CS.SKILL_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_DEPARTMENT CD ON SF.DEPARTMENT_CODE = CD.DEPARTMENT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_SCHOOL CSL ON SF.SCHOOL_CODE = CSL.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE SF.STAFF_NO = #{staffno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STAFF(STAFF_NO, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_GENDER, JUMIN_NO, SCHOOL_CODE, DEPARTMENT_CODE, GRADUATE_DAY) VALUES(STAFF_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{staffname}, 'ë‚¨', #{juminno}, (SELECT SCHOOL_CODE FROM CODE_SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolname}), (SELECT DEPARTMENT_CODE FROM CODE_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentname}), TO_DATE(#{graduateday},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
INSERT INTO STAFF_SKILL(STAFF_SKILL_NO, STAFF_NO, SKILL_CODE) VALUES( STAFF_SKILL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{staffno}, (SELECT SKILL_CODE FROM CODE_SKILL WHERE SKILL_NAME = #{skillname}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE STAFF SET STAFF_NAME = #{staffname}, JUMIN_NO = #{juminno}, SCHOOL_CODE = (SELECT SCHOOL_CODE FROM CODE_SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolname}), DEPARTMENT_CODE = (SELECT DEPARTMENT_CODE FROM CODE_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentname}) WHERE STAFF_NAME = #{staffname} AND JUMIN_NO = #{juminno}

UPDATE STAFF_SKILL SET SKILL_CODE = (SELECT SKILL_CODE FROM CODE_SKILL WHERE SKILL_NAME = #{skillname}) WHERE STAFF_NO = (SELECT STAFF_NO FROM STAFF WHERE STAFF_NAME=#{staffname} AND JUMIN_NO=#{juminno})
